mapper.select:
select count(1) from tbl_business_completemachinedetail com left join tbl_business_materiel ma on com.materielNo=ma.materielNo where com.compleId = #{completeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and ( com.materielNo like CONCAT('%',#{keys},'%') or ma.materielName like CONCAT('%',#{keys},'%') )
select cDetail.materielNo from tbl_business_completemachinedetail cDetail where compleId = #{completeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY updateTime desc

select m.materielNo as materielNo , m.materielName as materielName, m.modelSpecification as modelSpecification, m.footprint as footprint,cird.quantity as quantity, cird.comments as comment from tbl_business_completemachinedetail cird left join tbl_business_materiel m on cird.materielNo=m.materielNo where cird.compleId= #{completeId} ORDER BY cird.updateTime desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_business_completemachinedetail ( compleId, materielNo,quantity,updateTime,comments) values (#{compleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{materielNo.materielNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{updateTime},#{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tbl_business_completemachinedetail (id,compleId, materielNo,updateTime,comments) values
(#{cirdetail.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cirdetail.compleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cirdetail.materielNo.materielNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cirdetail.updateTime},#{cirdetail.comments})

update tbl_business_completemachinedetail
quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE},
comments = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbl_business_completemachinedetail set compleId = #{compleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, materielNo = #{materielNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, comments = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
